name: mwa-homework-07-mongodb-01-Tuvshintur
description: Create a NoSQL design model for an application to manage a library, taking into consideration the following requirements: * Books have an `ISBN number` and are categorized by `author` and tagged by `keywords` to facilitate search * Books can be borrowed by students, so the librarian will be able to check all borrowed books and their `return date` so he may contact students who are late returning their books.
